name: terrace
subTitle: Round Pool Series
text: If space for a pool is limited or you simply want a smaller design that is easy to maintain, the Terrace plunge pool is the perfect solution.  The softer, organic design will blend seamlessly with your landscaping and turn your backyard into your dream outdoor living space.
liText: Step for easy entry & exit from the pool
Plunge pool design perfect for cooling off on a hot day
Add optional spa jets for a complete hydrotherapy experience

name: infinity
subTitle: Round Pool Series
text: Make your small backyard even more functional and stylish with a round plunge pool. Enjoy the private pool experience without needing a lot of room and spend more time outside with your family.
liText: Step for easy entry & exit from the pool
1’3” wide bench seat around the perimeter
Add optional spa jets for a complete hydrotherapy experience

name: infinity14
subTitle: Round Pool Series
text: This larger model of the Infinity 14 maximizes functionality and aesthetics, offering the perfect balance of space-saving design and sophistication. Indulge in the luxury of a private pool experience without sacrificing precious outdoor space.
liText: Step for easy entry & exit from the pool
1’3” wide bench seat around the perimeter
Add optional spa jets for a complete hydrotherapy experience

name: Nova
subTitle: Spillway / Wading Pool
text: Create the ultimate outdoor entertaining area with a Nova Spillway Spa to compliment your new pool. The Nova has ample bench seating and seats up to 7 adults.

name: Cove
subTitle: Spillway / Wading Pool
text: The Cove spillway wading pool provides the perfect shallow paddling area which attaches to the side of your pool, and is perfect for kids at only 1’1” deep.

name: Elba-Spa
subTitle: Spillway / Wading Pool
text: The Elba Spa offers you the perfect opportunity to transform your backyard into a versatile haven, ideal for both relaxation and entertainment. Indulge in some well-deserved rest as your children have a blast splashing and playing in the pool.
liText: Plentiful bench seating on three sides
Easy entry & exit steps in two corners
Customize spa jet placement to suit your needs
Designed to be independent to your pool

name: Aqua Ledge
text: Create resort-style living in your own backyard by adding the Aqua Ledge to your pool. Imagine relaxing poolside and feeling like you are on holiday every day, without having to leave home.
liText: Can be added to any Aqua Technics pool
Available in our full range of colors – match or contrast with your pool
Can be used as a play zone for kids
Glass mosaic tiles attractively conceal insert between the pool and Aqua Ledge
Create the ultimate relaxation zone with Ledge Loungers and a table

name: Orion35
text: A sleek and contemporary pool model that redefines luxury outdoor living. With its distinctive curved design and integrated tanning ledge, the Orion 35 offers a sophisticated and inviting space for relaxation and recreation.

name: Saint-Grande
subTitle: Resort Series
text: The Saint-Grande is a luxurious Pool+Spa combination that perfectly balances swimming and relaxation zones in one elegantly crafted shell. With modern design features including a spacious entry zone, seating for up to 6 adults in the spa, and a seamless spillway, the Saint-Grande brings the holiday experience to your own backyard.
liText: Shallow entry zone with large second entry step area

name: Kensington
subTitle: Royal Series
text: Boasting stylish geometric lines perfect for any style of outdoor area, these pools will be the centerpiece of your new outdoor entertaining space. With unobtrusive side entry steps and a generous swimming area, this design can be enjoyed by the whole family for both fun and relaxation.
liText: Extended seating ledge running along one side of the pool
Deep end entry and exit step at the end of the ledge
Three unobtrusive side entry steps in the shallow end
8" fiberglass coping for added structural strength
Superior fade-resistant Pool ColorGuard® surface protection
Structurally supported steps and seating ledge

name: Marina
text: Offering a contemporary feel, this family friendly swimming pool design includes a safety ledge for added security. The Marina features a deep end swim out and a generous seating area that can be upgraded with spa jets.
liText: Generous swim space and deep end swim-out
Seating area that can be upgraded with spa jets

name: Fontane
text: Experience effortless outdoor entertainment with the Fontane Wader. Unwind on the bench seat while watching the children splashing around in the expansive wading area. There is no excuse not to have a lazy Sunday afternoon!
liText: Wading entry great for small kids or as a chill out zone
Bench seating along one side of the pool – ideal rest spot

name: Aquarius
subTitle: Innovation Series
text: The Aquarius has been thoughtfully designed with all your family’s needs in mind. With an attractive semi-circular step entry that extends out to a seating ledge, this pool is both stylish and functional.
liText: Extended seating ledge running the entire length of the pool
Wide edge beam with safe, non-slip surface
Full depth walls for maximum swimming area
Generous area for recreation and exercise including lap swimming
Optional spa jets for a soothing hydrotherapy massage

name: Capricorn
subTitle: Innovation Series
text: The Capricorn has been thoughtfully designed with all your family’s needs in mind. With an attractive semi-circular step entry that extends out to a seating ledge, this pool is both stylish and functional.
liText: Extended seating ledge running the entire length of the pool
Generous area for recreation and exercise including lap swimming
Optional spa jets for a soothing hydrotherapy massage

name: Terazza
subTitle: Villa Series
text: Escape to paradise and experience a luxurious outdoor hideaway in your own backyard with these stylish designs.
liText: Entry steps in the shallow end for easy access
Wider second entry step that can be used as a relaxation area

name: Torino
subTitle: Piazza Series
text: The clean, contemporary style of the Torino means it will complement any outdoor area and not become dated in years to come. Designed for larger areas, the Torino offers an abundance of space for swimming, playing or simply relaxing at the end of the day.

name: Siena
subTitle: Piazza Series
text: The clean, contemporary style of the Siena means it will complement any outdoor area and not become dated in years to come. Combined with our stunning range of modern colors, this pool will be the centerpiece of your entertaining area to be enjoyed by your family and friends.
liText: Corner side entry steps in shallow end

name: Regal
subTitle: Majestic Series
text: The Regal is a modern, fashionable pool style, created to complement today’s architectural styles. This pool features a unique safety ledge, ideal for children and those learning to swim. Wide entry steps offer an entrance point to both the shallow and deep end of the pool.
liText: Enter at shallow or deep end

name: Florentina
subTitle: Latin Series
text: The Florentina is a brand new contemporary geometric style pool model, and its 9’6” width makes it ideal for narrow spaces. The corner entry steps allow a generous swim space for the keen lap swimmer, whilst the full-length bench seat is the perfect spot to sit back and relax on a summers day!

name: Istana
subTitle: Villa Series
text: The Istana – 12’ X 21’7” features a modern, geometric design that will complement any outdoor style. Three full width steps provide easy entry into the pool and can also double as a seating area. Twin deep end swim outs are perfect for rest and relaxation zones.

name: Oxford
subTitle: Royal Series
text: The Oxford is a slimline small pool design with space saving, side entry steps and extended bench seating.

name: Empire
subTitle: Royal Series
text: One of our most popular pools, the Empire is designed to save space whilst still offering a generous swimming area. Incorporating an attractive, geometric, slim-line shape and unobtrusive side entry steps, this pool offers the maximum swimming area while still fitting perfectly into smaller backyards.

name: Amalfi
subTitle: Contemporary Series
text: The latest trend in pool design with perfectly balanced side entry steps, long seating ledge and generous swimming area. Steps at each end of the bench seat allow for easy entry and exit.

name: Elysian
subTitle: Villa Series
text: Escape to paradise and experience a luxurious hideaway of your own with the new Villa Series. The Elysian – 12'2" x 28'7" features a modern, geometric design that will complement any outdoor style. Three full width steps provide easy entry into the pool and can also double as a seating area. Twin deep end swim outs are perfect for rest and relaxation zones.

name: Grandeur
subTitle: Majestic Series
text: A popular and contemporary design that is sure to turn heads, the Grandeur features a safety ledge for added safety, stylish step entrance and a deep-end corner swim-out.
liText: Enter at shallow or deep end

name: Valentina
subTitle: Piazza Series
text: The modern, geometric style of the Valentina will complement any outdoor area. Ideal for family entertaining, this contemporary pool offers a generous swimming area and plenty of seating for relaxation.
liText: Ideal for laps or family entertaining

name: Saint-Louis
subTitle: Resort Series
text: The Saint-Louis is a Pool+Spa combination that gives you both swimming and relaxation zones within a single shell. Holiday at home with your own indulgent pool and spa experience.
liText: Shallow entry zone with large second entry step area

name: Saint-Remy
subTitle: Resort Series
text: The Saint-Remy is a Pool+Spa combination that gives you both swimming and relaxation zones within a single shell. Holiday at home with your own indulgent pool and spa experience.
liText: Shallow entry zone with large second entry step area
2m x 1.86m spa zone easily seats 6 adults

name: Castello
subTitle: Contemporary Series
text: The latest trend in pool design with perfectly balanced side entry steps, long seating ledge and generous swimming area. Steps at each end of the bench seat allow for easy entry and exit.

name: Bellagio
subTitle: Latin Series
text: The Bellagio is a contemporary geometric style pool model, and its 9’6” width makes it ideal for narrow spaces. The corner entry steps allow a generous swim space for the keen lap swimmer, whilst the full-length bench seat is the perfect spot to sit back and relax on a summers day!

name: Imperial
subTitle: Majestic Series
text: The Imperial has a modern and sophisticated design that is the ideal fit for today’s modern homes. Stylish side entry steps provide large uninterrupted swim areas whilst the deep-end corner swim-out offers an additional point of safety or the perfect place to sit and relax.
liText: Enter at shallow or deep end

name: Avellino
subTitle: Piazza Series
text: The Avellino is the latest addition to our best-selling Piazza Series. At 6m x 4m this modern, geometric design is ideal for smaller outdoor spaces while still offering plenty of space to swim thanks to clever side entry steps. The bench seat running the length of one side is the perfect place to relax in the cool water.
liText: Wide seating ledge along one side

name: Alto
subTitle: Piazza Series
text: At just 10'4" x 15'10" the Alto is suited to compact areas where space is precious but a pool is a must-have. A redeeming feature of the Alto is its generous depth of 4’6” – 5’11”, making it a genuine plunge pool that will keep you cool and relaxed all summer.

name: Palazzo
subTitle: Piazza Series
text: The Palazzo features a contemporary geometric design that will suit any outdoor area, extended bench seating along one side of the pool, perfect for adding spa jets, and an uninterrupted swimming area with plenty of room for the whole family.

name: Harmony
subTitle: Vogue Series
text: The Harmony showcases a chic geometric style designed for smaller outdoor areas. Its slim 9’6” width makes it perfect for narrow spaces and the extended entry step in the shallow end can double as a seat. With the addition of optional spa jets, you can create a soothing relaxation zone perfect for a hydrotherapy massage.

name: Bellino
subTitle: Contemporary Series
text: The latest trend in pool design with perfectly balanced side entry steps, long seating ledge and generous swimming area. Steps at each end of the bench seat allow for easy entry and exit.

name: Portofino
subTitle: Latin Series
text: The Portofino is a geometric style pool model, and its 9’6” width makes it ideal for narrow spaces. It’s 19’4” length also means it’s the perfect option if you have a smaller sized yard. The corner entry steps allow a generous swim space for the keen lap swimmer, whilst the full-length bench seat is the perfect spot to sit back and relax on a summers day!

name: Sovereign
subTitle: Royal Series
text: The Sovereign is designed to save space whilst still offering a generous swimming area. Incorporating an attractive, geometric, slim-line shape and unobtrusive side entry steps, this pool offers the maximum swimming area while still fitting perfectly into smaller backyards.

name: ALLURE
subTitle: Vogue Series
text: The Allure has been designed with small outdoor spaces in mind. Narrow in design and compact in length, the Allure is perfect for today’s smaller block sizes. Unobtrusive, twin side entry steps and generous depths allow for maximum swimming area while an extended entry step in the shallow end creates the perfect relaxation zone.
liText: Extended entry steps in shallow end

name: Latina
subTitle: Piazza Series
text: The Latina has been designed with small outdoor spaces in mind. Built with an extended bench seating along one side of the pool, perfect for adding spa jets. Enjoy an uninterrupted swimming area with plenty of room for the whole family. With it’s contemporary geometric design, the Latina will suit any outdoor area.

name: verona
subTitle: Latin Series
text: The Verona is a geometric lap pool design perfect for narrow spaces and small backyards. The corner entry steps allow an uninterrupted swim space, whilst the full-length bench seat provides the perfect spot to sit and relax.

name: Serenity
subTitle: Vogue Series
text: The Serenity has been designed with small outdoor spaces in mind. Narrow in design and compact in length, the Serenity is perfect for today’s smaller block sizes. Unobtrusive, twin side entry steps and generous depths allow for maximum swimming area while an extended entry step in the shallow end creates the perfect relaxation zone.
